segments.text: Yes , please . I'm looking for a cotton polo shirt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the design , but don't particularly care for the colour . Do you have that in other colours , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they come in white , pale yellow , aqua , red and green . Will a white one do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I prefer white - and may I see a pale yellow one , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why , of course . Let's see ... White ... Pale yellow . Here you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
